<h3 id="X38138">X(38138) = CENTROID OF TRIANGLE {X(4), X(5), X(8)}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 4*a^4-4*(b+c)*a^3+(b^2+8*b*c+c^2)*a^2+4*(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*a-5*(b^2-c^2)^2  :  :

<br>
<b>X(38138) = 2*X(1)-5*X(5) = X(1)+5*X(355) = 8*X(1)-5*X(1483) = X(1)-5*X(5587) = 7*X(1)+5*X(5881) = 3*X(1)-5*X(5886) = 7*X(1)-10*X(5901) = 7*X(1)-15*X(7988) = 4*X(1)-5*X(10283) = X(1)-10*X(18357) = 4*X(1)+5*X(37705) = 3*X(1)+5*X(37712) = 11*X(1)-5*X(37727) = X(5)+2*X(355) = 4*X(5)-X(1483) = 7*X(5)+2*X(5881) = 3*X(5)-2*X(5886) = 7*X(5)-4*X(5901) = 7*X(5)-6*X(7988) = 11*X(5)-14*X(7989) = 13*X(5)-10*X(8227) = X(5)-4*X(18357) = 2*X(5)+X(37705) = 3*X(5)+2*X(37712) = X(5)-10*X(37714) = 11*X(5)-2*X(37727)</b>
<p>X(38138) lies on these lines: {1,5}, {2,28224}, {4,4678}, {8,546}, {10,550}, {30,5657}, {40,28182}, {140,5731}, {145,3851}, {165,15686}, {381,5844}, {382,3617}, {515,549}, {516,3627}, {517,3845}, {518,38137}, {519,38034}, {547,10246}, {632,9956}, {944,3628}, {946,3857}, {962,3861}, {971,38170}, {1385,10172}, {1478,11545}, {1482,3850}, {1503,38165}, {1698,14869}, {1699,23046}, {2829,38177}, {3036,22799}, {3090,18526}, {3091,12645}, {3241,11737}, {3530,9780}, {3544,3623}, {3545,10247}, {3564,38144}, {3576,11539}, {3579,28172}, {3616,35018}, {3621,3855}, {3622,5079}, {3626,22793}, {3654,28178}, {3679,15687}, {3830,28216}, {3832,8148}, {3843,12245}, {3853,12702}, {3858,4701}, {4745,28150}, {5055,7967}, {5056,37624}, {5066,5603}, {5072,10595}, {5076,20070}, {5428,11500}, {5432,37006}, {5691,15704}, {5762,38154}, {5766,5817}, {5770,37281}, {5816,16675}, {5842,38178}, {5843,6917}, {5846,38136}, {5853,38139}, {5854,38141}, {5855,38142}, {6102,23841}, {6912,12331}, {6946,12773}, {7508,18524}, {7979,20584}, {8256,38213}, {8703,26446}, {9613,34753}, {9656,11544}, {9812,14893}, {10039,10386}, {10164,28208}, {10171,38022}, {10175,15699}, {11230,28236}, {11278,12571}, {11591,16980}, {12811,18493}, {13624,22266}, {15177,37936}, {15712,18481}, {15714,34628}, {17504,19875}, {17563,25005}, {17564,34122}, {19710,28164}, {24475,30329}, {28146,34648}, {28154,31673}, {28202,38098}, {31649,32141}</p>
<p>
X(38138) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {355, 5587}, {5731, 18525}, {5886, 37712}, {9812, 34718}, {10246, 34627}, {10283, 37705}, {18480, 38176}, {34648, 38127}<br>
X(38138) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (5, 5587), (549, 38042), (1385, 10172), (1483, 10283), (5587, 18357), (5603, 5066), (5690, 38176), (5731, 140), (8703, 26446), (9812, 14893), (10165, 9956), (10246, 547), (10283, 5), (15686, 165), (17502, 3828), (17504, 19875), (34773, 10165), (38028, 10175), (38034, 38140), (38112, 5790)<br>
X(38138) = X(549)-of-Fuhrmann-triangle<br>
X(38138) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (5, 355, 37705), (5, 37705, 1483), (355, 5886, 37712), (355, 18357, 5), (355, 37714, 18357), (5587, 5881, 7988), (5587, 37712, 5886), (5690, 18480, 3627), (5790, 38112, 38081), (5818, 18525, 140), (9956, 34773, 632), (10175, 38028, 15699), (19925, 22791, 3858), (38034, 38140, 38071), (38156, 38157, 5587)<br>
</p>
